title.rendered: Wyndham and Decameron Team Up to Expand All-Inclusive Offerings

content.rendered:
Deal brings over 2,600 rooms into Wyndham’s rapidly growing
all-inclusive portfolio, now spanning more than 50 resorts globally

PARSIPPANY, N.J., May 14, 2024 /PRNewswire/ — Wyndham Rewards® members can now access more all-inclusive offerings than ever before, including nine new resorts across Mexico, Panama and Jamaica, thanks to a newly formed alliance between Wyndham Hotels & Resorts and Decameron All Inclusive Hotels & Resorts.

Originally published at https://www.prnewswire.com/news-releases/wyndham-and-decameron-team-up-to-expand-all-inclusive-offerings-302144084.html
Images courtesy of https://pixabay.com
